sen.j: 朝廷では源氏の源頼義を新たに陸奥守、鎮守府将軍に任命して派遣するが、朝廷において上東門院藤原彰子の祈願のために安倍氏に大赦が出され、講和が成立。
sen.e: The Imperial Court then appointed MINAMOTO no Yoriyoshi both Mutsu no kami and Chinjufu Shogun (Commander-in-chief of the Defense of the North) and sent him to attack the Abe clan; however, the Abe clan received an amnesty to pray for Jotomon-in FUJIWARA no Shoshi; both sides concluded a peace.
